column4: i changed the name in that file and in /etc/network/interfaces to eth0 and it started
sorry and restarted networking and still showing eth1
did you do eth0 ifup or something like that
i tried ifup eth0 and ifup eth1
and it said they are not configured..so i tried ifdown on same interfaces
its sill up and working but labeled eth1
maybe i need to reboot after editing that file...i just changed the 0 to a 1 and removed the eth0 that was in there because it came from an image of a previous machine..
awesome will let you know the outcome
